body:
Comment 3: 
The problem appears to be for tests outside the package (packag fmt_test vs fmt):

% go test -short -cover bytes flag fmt os strings sync time
ok  	bytes	0.107s	coverage: 0.0% of statements
ok  	flag	0.008s	coverage: 0.0% of statements
ok  	fmt	0.042s	coverage: 0.0% of statements
ok  	os	0.473s	coverage: 0.0% of statements
ok  	strings	0.113s	coverage: 0.0% of statements
ok  	sync	0.052s	coverage: 0.0% of statements
ok  	time	2.348s	coverage: 0.0% of statements
% go test -cover encoding/binary
ok  	encoding/binary	0.007s	coverage: 80.1% of statements
%
